MCO_1040_42B.name: MCO 1040.42B
MCO_1040_42B.title: Warrant Officer (WO) and Limited Duty Officer (LDO) Accession Programs
MCO_1040_42B.description: Governing order for WO and LDO programs. Contains eligibility requirements, application procedures, and selection criteria.

keyRequirements.timeInService: 8-22 years for Regular, 8-26 years for Reserve
keyRequirements.timeInGrade: 1 year as SSgt, 2 years as Sgt

MCO_1326_6.name: MCO 1326.6
MCO_1326_6.title: Selecting, Screening, and Preparing Enlisted Marines for Screenable Billets (SCREENMAN)
MCO_1326_6.description: Governing order for SDA and independent duty assignments including Recruiting Duty, Drill Instructor, MSG, etc.

SECNAV_M_5216_5.name: SECNAV M-5216.5
SECNAV_M_5216_5.title: Department of the Navy Correspondence Manual
SECNAV_M_5216_5.description: Standard for all DON correspondence. Governs letter format, endorsements, and administrative correspondence.

letterFormat.font: 12-point Times New Roman or Courier preferred
letterFormat.ssic: Four or five-digit Standard Subject Identification Code

MCO_1020_34H.name: MCO 1020.34H
MCO_1020_34H.title: Marine Corps Uniform Regulations
MCO_1020_34H.description: Uniform and grooming standards including tattoo policy.

tattooPolicy.noContent: No content tattoos that are obscene, gang-related, or discriminatory
tattooPolicy.noHead: No tattoos on head, neck, or hands (with limited exceptions)
tattooPolicy.documentation: All tattoos must be documented with photos
tattooPolicy.waivers: Some restrictions may be waiverable for prior service

DoDI_6130_03.name: DoDI 6130.03
DoDI_6130_03.title: Medical Standards for Appointment, Enlistment, or Induction
DoDI_6130_03.description: Medical qualification standards for military service and commissioning.

keyStandards.medical: Varies by condition - waiver possible for many

MARADMIN_ANNUAL.name: Annual WO Selection Board MARADMIN
MARADMIN_ANNUAL.description: Published annually with specific board dates, deadlines, and requirements. Check Marines.mil MARADMIN archive for current FY.
